amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow conveyance or exchange of federal land within the Withdrawal Area to or with State trust land entities, as well as Indian tribes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part E of House Report 116-264 to allow conveyance or exchange of federal land within the Withdrawal Area to or with State trust land entities, as well as Indian tribes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 233 (Roll no. 593).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Gosar.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 233 (Roll no. 593).
